        private static final java.lang.String SPECIALCHARS

      • KEY_PATTERN

        private static final java.lang.String KEY_PATTERN
        Regex pattern for validating keyword strength. Keyword must include at least: - one small letter - one big letter - one digit - one Specialchrar defined in SPECIALCHARS - between 10 and 20 chars long.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
